Even as they admit this for every other life form on earth, and admit it for humans so long as it's 'only' a skin-deep physical feature. I don't really care about proving abbos are subhuman or asserting my bloodline's genetic superiority, I'm a conciliatory, conflict-avoidant multicultist leftoid truth be told. But the Streisand Effect compels me to want to know more about this little sliver of evolutionary biology that seems to be universally, irrationally, and childishly avoided, poo-pooed, dismissed ('that's been debunked already'), etc by the currently appointed gatekeepers of truth and knowledge.
